content.body: Is `toString` intentionally omitted from the Location object's IDL? https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/nav-history-apis.html
content.formatted_body: Is toString intentionally omitted from the Location object's IDL? https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/nav-history-apis.html

content.body: Actually, since `toString` could alternatively be defined in the additional creation steps but is not, I ought to ask: can someone tell me where `location.toString` is defined? (Chrome and Firefox expose it as an "own" property. Unlike what's spec'd for `location.valueOf`, the value is distinct from the corresponding property on the Object prototype.)
content.formatted_body: Actually, since toString could alternatively be defined in the additional creation steps but is not, I ought to ask: can someone tell me where location.toString is defined? (Chrome and Firefox expose it as an "own" property. Unlike what's spec'd for location.valueOf, the value is distinct from the corresponding property on the Object prototype.)
